phrases: Open your mind.
Open your mind.
Far beyond the deep blue Earth, you and I shall meet...
AH! MY GODDESS
AH! MY GODDESS
A snow-white feather will come fluttering down, swaying gently in the air.
Without holding back, I want to envelope you, my one and only love.
I know I have the power to protect the one I love, right here in my hands.
Open your mind.
Just as I have always dreamed.
Let the wind carry off your hopes, faraway.
I have wings nobody can see.
Look, you have them, too.
They will take us to where we can be free.
Anyone can be free.
The sky is so blue...
We are done!
Is it all right if we eat now?
Nurse's Office
Ah!
What Do Talent and Hard Work Have to Do With It?
Good job!
Here.
Thanks!
You have improved greatly, have not you?
Yeah.
Thanks to everyone is hard work!
We are going to do really well this year, I bet.
Morisato!
Here are your lap times.
On average, you took a whole second off this time!
Really?
I guess I have you guys to thank for that!
Please, Morisato.
No one else has improved as much as you have.
Morisato, I am sure you have a talent for driving.
You might be a genius!
A genius?
I do not think so!
Come on, I am not trying to flatter you!
Hey!
Hasegawa!
Yes!
Excuse me.
Miss Hasegawa is such a hard worker, is not she?
Yeah, she is not really the type to stand out, but she always gives it her all.
She is a real behind the scenes type, I guess you would say.
You mean she is a backseat driver?
Uh, no...
You mean she is a backseat driver?
That is not what I meant...
What?
I cannot do that!
There is no way I can do that!
It is too late!
We already signed you up.
You did not!
What is going on?
Morisato, just look at this!
Let us see...a go-kart race, female drivers only?
It is a new event they are introducing this year.
We have decided to participate in the race.
There is no way I can do it!
We have decided to participate in the race.
There is no'no way' about it!
You are the only female member we have.
We do not have any choice!
Why do not you give it a shot?
I think Keiichi's right.
Not you too!
Do not worry!
It is not going to be a tough race, since all the drivers will be girls.
It is not going to work out!
There is absolutely no way that I can race!
But why not?
I just know it!
I know I cannot do it!
Listen, you do know how to drive a regular car, do not you?
Well, yes...
Then, do not worry.
It will seem like you are going really fast at first, but you will realize...
But still!
A man's got to have balls!
Go on!
But I am a woman...
A man's got to have balls!
Go on!
Too...too fast!
O Spirit who exists in the Valley of Air... O Spirit who arrives with the Wind!
Air Bug Spiralee!
Stifle that vehicle's power!
The engine shut down!
Great, she got lucky!
Miss Hasegawa?
Are you afraid of riding this go-kart?
I am terrified!
There is no way that I am ever going to be able to drive that thing!
All right, looks like it is still intact, Den-chan!
But I do not know if we can keep it running until the race.
And we cannot have Hasegawa getting hurt.
Yeah, I think you are right about that.
She will be fine!
I am certain that she will be able to drive that kart!
Huh?
Belldandy?
Please, will you let me take care of this?
Boot camp, huh?
Well, I guess it is just like Belldandy to come up with something like that.
Whoops!
I forgot to turn off Banpei!
What?
What...what in the world is this thing?
Please forgive us.
Sorry about that.
I am fine, I am fine!
I am just a little out of breath, that is all.
But anyway, that robot you made is very impressive!
It is really amazing!
He is, is not he?
If you can tell how awesome my Banpei is, you are amazing yourself!
Now, now, let us not get carried away.
Oh, you shut up!
Listen!
You are here to train, are not you?
Then I am going to help you out!
Huh?
Oh, um...
I did not know you had something like this right in your backyard.
Actually, this is the first time I have ever seen it myself.
Only one person would do this...
I made it!
Only one person would do this...
I call it the Tariki Hongan Temple Race Circuit!
There is a super-tight curve at the first corner!
You have got to time your deceleration and acceleration perfectly!
Once you are through an S-shaped chicane...
You will exploit the full potential of your machine!
And once you clear the last hill, it is just a straightaway to the finish line.
Well?
Brilliant, would not you say?
Um, we are just borrowing this place, you know.
Never mind the little details!
Time to practice!
If you can just master this course of mine, you will have nothing to fear!
But I cannot do it!
It is beyond me, really!
Do not worry!
Look at that!
My Voice-controlled Device, the'Aye-Aye-Sir' No. 1!
Just tell him what to do and he will drive for you!
Hmm...
Too fast!
Aye, aye, sir!
No, what I meant was slow down!
Stop, please!
Aye, aye, sir!
You should have just let me take care of this!
Come on, as if you could ever get it right, Urd!
Oh, want to bet?
Ta-da!
Industrial-strength Jekyll Hyde 500!
Not again!
The thing is, she is way too timid, and that is what we have got to fix!
This will reverse her personality!
In other words, she will become super-aggressive!
Hasegawa?
Why do not you shut up?
Get off my case!
Man, what a drag...
That potion reversed her diligent nature as well...
I knew you could not handle it, Urd!
It was just a little too strong for her.
I will just neutralize it with this!
Morisato!
I am going to go out now, so get all the shopping done before I come back!
Let us go, Dai-chan!
Was that Tamiya just now?
Let us go, Dai-chan!
Well, it is supposed to turn her into the person who resembles her the least.
Oh, I get it...
What is the problem, Hasegawa?
I cannot do it after all.
I will never be able to go fast like you, Morisato!
Hasegawa...
I just do not have the talent for this, you see!
Neither do I...
Yes, you do.
Look how fast you can make that kart go.
No matter how many times I try, I am still scared!
Look, I am just as scared as you.
How can it not be scary?
Let us call it a day, then.
Why do not you go wash your face?
All right.
Ouch!
All right, that should make it better.
Thank you very much.
There is just no way that I can do this.
Here you all are, trying to help me out, and I am still not getting better.
I just keep messing up...
I know you can do it!
How in the world can you say that?
I have tried and tried with all my might and I have never once succeeded!
That cannot be true.
Yes, it is true!
Miss Hasegawa...
Let us eat.
Tomorrow I will see to it that you do better, I promise you!
Not going to happen.
Oh, come on!
Not going to happen.
As if you did not mess up yourself!
Did I, now?
What is the big idea?
Yuck...
What is the big idea?
What is this slimy stuff that is sticking to my tongue?
I am sorry.
I am the one who made it.
Huh?
I have been a terrible cook since I was a little girl.
They used to call me the Homicidal Chef...
My teacher put'Please have Sora practice cooking' on my report card.
All right, then please let me make dinner tonight.
That way, I can show you once and for all that no matter what I do...
Miss Hasegawa...
I went through intense training.
I had my mom teach me at home, and I practiced everyday.
But no matter what I do, I always fail.
So please...
One more time...
Let us try it one more time.
One more time.
All right, please get on.
Um, where am I supposed to sit?
Right here.
What?
There?
All right, we are off!
Careful, now.
It is scary...it is scary after all!
Just because we are riding double does not make it any less terrifying!
A skylark.
If you are looking down at the ground, you will lose sight of what is around you...
Look straight ahead and feel the wind.
And little by little, start talking to your machine...
Look straight ahead...
Look straight ahead...
Hey, is it all right if ride you?
I wonder if I am good enough to?
I do not know.
Here she comes.
All right!
She completed the course!
Good job, Hasegawa!
Thanks to you, Morisato.
You see?
You can do anything if you try.
Do not act like such a hotshot when everything you did was useless.
What did you say?
You want to fight?
What did you say?
You little...
Here is to the end of training camp and Hasegawa's great achievements...
Cheers!
This is great!
Really?
I made that, you know.
Really, it is delicious!
All your hard training paid off, did not it?
Yes!
Now all you have to do is to come in first tomorrow!
Huh?
Oh, yes, that is right.
Hey, why are you all spaced out?
You know you are going to win for sure!
Tomorrow...
Miss Hasegawa?
Miss Hasegawa...um...
Oh, I am all right.
I admit I am still a little anxious, but...
I really appreciate all your support.
Well, then, good night!
It is going to be all right... this time...
I will be all right...this time, for sure!
Miss Hasegawa...
Ready, set...
Right, we are set.
Where is Hasegawa?
What is holding her up?
She is going to be late.
Miss Hasegawa, are you ready to go?
Yes.
Miss Hasegawa?
Miss Hasegawa!
I got a stomachache all of a sudden.
Oh, no!
We have to get you to the doctor right away.
No, I think I will be fine if I just lie down a while.
But...
What?
Does that mean she is not going to be in the race?
After all that training, too.
It is just a stomachache, she is got to psyche herself out of it!
I would like to ask a favor of you...
Would you please wait, just a little?
Miss Hasegawa, I have brought you some rice gruel.
Belldandy...
Yes?
When I was in grammar school, I practiced hard to learn how to cook.
I did not want to make everyone else look bad at a presentation in home ec class.
I practiced and practiced and my friends all cheered me on.
And I did get a lot better.
My cooking started to taste a little better too.
But...
You feigned...your illness?
Yes.
Even though I practiced so hard, I was so scared that I might fail.
While I was resting in the nurse's office, tears started rolling down my face.
I was so frustrated, and so embarrassed.
I was so ashamed of myself...
That is why I decided then and there that I would never pull a stunt like that again.
But...
But?
But I am still scared, after all!
Whenever I think that I might fail, it scares me so much I cannot even move!
This is who you are right now.
Please, give her all of your support.
Please believe in her.
You have done so much to get to this point!
Belldandy...
But, Belldandy...
We all get scared.
But you never want to betray yourself, so you have to...
Why do you suppose Keiichi was able to improve his lap time?
What?
Not because of his talent.
But because he is trained so hard to overcome his fear and insecurities.
A genius?
I do not think so!
Look, I am just as scared as you.
How can it not be scary
If you are looking down at the ground, you will lose sight of what is around you...
Morisato...
You have got one hour before the race starts.
Morisato!
All right!
I am not going to look down at the ground anymore.
Always believe in yourself and your Dreams.
You have a Wing!
I love you so much it hurts...
And it hurts me that I cannot tell you how I feel.
You and I have matching hearts...
So we must share the same scars deep down inside.
But now that I am in your arms, I think I can catch...
Nobody else matters...
All we have to do is gaze at each other.
It is all right for your heart to flutter...
All we have to do is love each other.
Open your heart, and ride that favorable wind.
Do not run away from happiness.
I will always be waiting for you.
So come rest your wings anytime.
It is all right to cry... anytime you need to.
I just want to see you again...
All we have to do is love each other.
Open your heart, and ride that favorable wind.
I just want you to be happy.
The sea...it is both the source of life, and a place to rest your soul.
Embraced by Nature, the goddesses bare their minds and souls.
Next episode: Ah! Confess Your Love Under the Moon?
Megumi, just watch this brave act of mine!
